english.segment1: Fleeting breath, Frailest flesh. I'm a casualty at best. And so I sink into Your depth. My only place of rest
english.segment2: Where earth and wind, and sky and sea. Could never match Your majesty. From where I stand, I'm crying out. Jesus, You are life to me
english.segment3: The treachery of valleys deep. Has only made me weak. I clothe this flesh with holiness. My only place of rest
english.segment4: Where earth and wind, and sky and sea. Will never match Your majesty. From where I stand, I'm crying out. Jesus, You are life to me
english.segment5: And when I see Your face I'll know. All the pain and tears will go. To the bottom of the sea. You'll forever be holy, holy
english.segment7: Where earth and wind, and sky and sea. Will never match Your majesty. From where I stand, I'm crying out. Jesus, You are life to me
english.segment10: When all is fallen (You are life to me). When all is broken (You are life to me). When all is empty (You are life to me). Life to me, life to me
english.segment12: When all is fallen (You are life to me). When all is broken (You are life to me). When all is empty (You are life to me). Life to me, life to me
